user_query: I want to compare the exchange rates for USD, EUR, and GBP for the last three years. Can you provide me with the historical rates starting from 2019-01-01? Also, list all available currencies.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of all available currencies to understand the options for comparison.
Retrieve the historical exchange rates for USD, EUR, and GBP starting from 2019-01-01.
